doc:
Ben Gage https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ben_Gage 0 Ben Gage (October 29, 1914 - April 28, 1978) was an American radio singer and announcer, occasional off-screen film singer dubbing the voice of non-singing actors, and television actor active from 1937 to 1975. Born in Chicago, Illinois, he was married to film star Esther Williams. Ben_Gage ( October_29_,_1914 - April_28_,_1978 ) was an_American_radio_singer_and_announcer , occasional_off-screen_film_singer dubbing the_voice of non-singing_actors , and television_actor_active from 1937 to 1975 . Born in Chicago , Illinois , he was_married to film_star_Esther_Williams .
